title: Happy Day to Grant Hutchinson
content:
[Grant Hutchinson](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Grant%20Hutchinson), part-time [Splorp](http://web.archive.org/web/20060526013046/http:/www.splorp.com/)er, and full-time [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20060526013046/http:/www.veer.com/)ster celebrates his 30-something birthday today. Grant is the quintessential Typophile, dipping his toes in every aspect of typography - fontographing, selling, writing, and all the tech stuff. He’s been around the block and knows what’s what and I’m proud to call him a pal.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/grant2.jpg)

Pictured: Grant in his natural habitat.
author: Stephen Coles

comments.content:
Thanks Stewf. Thanks Eric. Thanks Chris.

If I’ve learned one thing while having my mug stuck in front of a webcam for the past decade… don’t pick your nose.

I appreciate the conservatively varietal series of images.

Oh, and it’s actually 40-something. I can only lucidly dream of my 30s at this point.

Ta.

Hip hip Hurray!

I’m also happy to know Grant as an “amigo sympatico”!

Best  
/SH
Grant: very very happy birthday!!!!! felicidades!

Well done Grant! $5 says you’ll be the only person at TC 2006 that’s not wearing the KERN zip up!

Si

Well, that _would_ be true, Si, but [mine](http://web.archive.org/web/20060526013046/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/search/tags:veer/) was stolen when some font lovin’ fool broke into my car last week.

That’s sad :-( if you lived anywhere other than the bay area the crook would be easy to spot, but my guess is that they’re quite common down there.

I’ll put the $5 towards a replacement.

Si

Thanks everyone. The wishes are appreciated.

Stewf… I am saddened by your loss. Let me see what I can do…

Happy birthday Grant. Great to have you around (and damn handy as well). :^)

It’s a crying shame Veer merch doesn’t ship outside North America. :^(

Grant, font man of the world, happy BD.

And here’s a small gift: you definitely still look 30-something.

hhp
Ah I totally missed this…a few days late, but still – Happy Birthday Grant! :-D

That’s alright Peter… I nearly missed it myself.

Thanks again for all the kind wishes.
